h2_title: Centipede Guai Boss Fight and Guide
content: It can also rear back while still crouched on the ground, and extend its head to lunge at you up to two times in a row with reaching claw swipes.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Centipede_Guai.md', within the main section titled 'Centipede Guai', specifically from the subsection 'Centipede Guai Boss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
It can also rear back while still crouched on the ground, and extend its head to lunge at you up to two times in a row with reaching claw swipes.
